attributes.action: recognise that the recent catastrophic failure in data protection by HMRC has fundamentally undermined the British public's confidence in the government's ability to safeguard personal data and has therefore destroyed public support for the national ID card.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
